body:
School conjuration (healing)

Level alchemist 4, bard 4, cleric 4, druid 5, inquisitor 4, witch 5

Duration instantaneous

Saving Throw Will half (harmless) or Will half

Spell Resistance yes (harmless)

Target Restrictions personal, selected

The target of a wordspell with this effect word is cured of 4d6 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +20). Undead are damaged by this effect word, but can attempt a Will save for half damage and spell resistance as normal.
name: Elder Cure
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Healing Words/Elder Cure

sections.body: The target is cured of 4d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +20).
sections.name: Boost
